data.title: Michael Sullivan
data.meta_description: Michael Sullivan is a principal with Baker Tilly’s consulting practice.
data.text:
As a principal within Baker Tilly’s consulting practice, Michael acts as a trusted advisor to clients, supporting their organizations with everything from regular financial reporting and technical GAAP application to CFO level strategic planning and forecasting.

Additionally, Michael also frequently advises customers regarding the implementation of the latest accounting standards and tax legislation as well as structural improvements to operational and financial processes. He works with clients in a broad range of industries such as high-technology, life science, manufacturing, distribution and professional services.

Before joining the firm, Michael worked in a supervisor capacity in the audit departments of a Connecticut based accounting firm, where he was responsible for planning and completing audit/attest engagements in various industries throughout New England.
